casebody.data:
In re S.J.M. No. 363A07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 17, 2007. Beverly Basden, Sanford, for Lee County DSS. Susan J. Hall, Fayetteville, for Father. Elizabeth Boone, for GAL.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd day of August 2007 by Respondent to Withdraw as Counsel:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 17th day of September 2007."
